# Peroot (Hebrew Prompt Engineering)

Peroot turns raw ideas into structured, high-quality prompts in Hebrew (RTL-first).

## Key URLs
- https://peroot.ai/
- https://peroot.ai/privacy
- https://peroot.ai/accessibility

## Product Summary
- Hebrew-first prompt improver
- Structured "Great Prompt" output
- Clarifying questions (0-3)
- Prompt strength scoring
- Personal prompt library

## Contact
- support@peroot.net
